channel.title: Fixed 718 Client for Opcodes
channel.description:
Fixed 718 Client for Opcodes - Today, 09:36 AM This is the fix for Opcode troubles people are having. Enjoy let me know if there are any problems, If you need to contact me... My Skype is: novalfye
I'm nice... The things I'm good at, I help others for free.
[code]http://www.fallen-armageddon.com/release/Fixed%20Client%20For%20Opcode%20Errors.rar[/code]
Note: this will only work for up to 732.

item.title: Fixed 718 Client for Opcodes
item.dc:creator: @jeton jeton
item.description:
@jeton wrote:

[quote=“mercury13, post:5, topic:458750”]bro can you plis give me a 732 client link the link you posted is broken dropbox 404 error.
beueace i use a 732 scoure NRS3server V4 i can give you the link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586200.0.html
i’ve downloaded the scoure and a 732 cache but i need a 732 client beueace then i try too run it on matrix 718 client it say on the cmd: game_report_crash
thank you ;)[/quote]

hi if u got somthing can u tell mee then i need et tooo but not fiore ths server fore other server but i need client 732 pleas igf u got somthing tell me pleas
